name: Duchess Cave from Cally Car Park

ai.summary: An easy 2.3 km out-and-back hike from Cally Car Park to Duchess Cave in the UK. The route is gentle and suitable for most walkers, with a short cave entrance at the end. Expect grassy paths, some uneven ground and possible mud, and bring a light for the cave interior.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly grassy and compact trails with occasional uneven, muddy sections. The approach to the cave may involve damp rocks and a modest amount of scrambling near the entrance; sturdy footwear is advised.
ai.safety_notes: Wear sturdy footwear and take care on uneven ground. The cave entrance is dark and damp; carry a torch or headlamp. Keep a safe distance from the cave mouth, stay on the path, and check weather conditions before you go. Stay with companions, and inform someone of your plans.
recommended_gear: Map or offline navigation, fully charged phone
ai.best_seasons: All year, with spring to autumn offering the best daylight and typically drier conditions; in winter be prepared for mud and reduced visibility inside the cave.

seo.title: Duchess Cave from Cally Car Park – Easy 2.3 km UK Hike
seo.meta_description: Discover a gentle 2.3 km hike from Cally Car Park to Duchess Cave in the UK. Easy terrain, cave entrance, safety tips and gear for a short, family-friendly outing.
seo.h1: Duchess Cave from Cally Car Park – Easy 2.3 km Hike in the UK
